title: Deprecated raft cmd AdminCmdType::Split is reused
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
   Release Version:   4.0.0-rc
   Git Commit Hash:   8a43dccee00a396ce7ab766ae6afb6505a94c1b2
   Git Commit Branch: release-4.0
   UTC Build Time:    2020-04-24 03:34:49

### What did happened?
tiflash received raft cmd `AdminCmdType::Split` which has been deprecated since tikv 2.x.
Should use `BatchSplit` instead.
